Title: Lunatask: Encrypted to-do list, life-tracking, journaling and notes app
URL: https://lunatask.app/
Text: Encrypted to-do list, life-tracking, journaling and notes app | Lunatask
[Skip to main content](#__docusaurus_skipToContent_fallback)
# Get stuff actually done this time.
Lunatask is an all-in-oneencryptedto-do list, habit tracker, journaling, life-tracking and notes app.
It remembers stuff for you and keeps track of your mental well-being üåü[Get Started for Free](https://lunatask.app/download)
![Lunatask](https://lunatask.app/assets/images/Artboard-46ce7f8c3d5dddd4c137b3b9491d26ea.png)
![Task list](https://lunatask.app/assets/images/mobile-tasks-fd076909f09d0e5f746fe779f5c3e928.png)
## Smarter Lists
Our lists[automatically prioritize tasks for you](https://lunatask.app/docs/features/tasks/overview)to take the weight off your shoulders and ensure no task is left behind. Build your perfect workflow by combining numerous built-in and battle-tested productivity techniques.
#### Must/Should/Want Method
#### Eisenhower Matrix
#### Pomodoro-style Timer
#### Work-in-progress Limit
## Daily Calendar & Time Blocking

Title: Top 7 Mood Tracker Apps for 2026: Features, UX & Insights
Author: Fiza Shahid
Published Date: 2025-10-30T14:20:18.000Z
URL: https://www.clustox.com/blog/mood-tracker-apps/
Text: Some days feel like you‚Äôre riding a rollercoaster with no seatbelt. One moment you‚Äôre on top of the world, the next you‚Äôre stuck in a gloomy loop.

Mood tracker apps can act like little sidekicks, helping you map your emotional ups and downs. They show patterns, reveal triggers, and even help you celebrate the small wins when your mood improves. Think of them as your personal weather app, but for your feelings.

Taking care of your mental health is more important than ever. The [World Health Organization (WHO) estimates](https://www.who.int/publications/i/item/9789240049338) that around one in eight people worldwide is living with a mental disorder. Using a mood tracker can be a simple way to spot patterns, manage stress, and take little steps to feel better each day.

Keeping track of your mood doesn‚Äôt have to be complicated or stressful. A quick daily check-in can reveal surprising patterns, like how certain routines lift your spirits or which habits might be draining you. Over time, you start understanding your emotions better and spotting tren

## TL;DR
This guide breaks down 30+ calendar UI examples, from daily planners and booking flows to enterprise tools and habit trackers, with UX tips you can apply right away. Whether you're designing a scheduling app or adding a simple date picker, you'll find inspiration, practical takeaways, and ready-to-use kits to speed up your workflow. Dive in to see how calendars can do more than mark dates ‚Äîthey can drive real productivity and user delight.

Title: Mood Tracker | Lunatask
Author: 
Published Date: 2019-01-01T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://lunatask.app/docs/features/mood-tracker
Text: Mood Tracker | Lunatask
[Skip to main content](#__docusaurus_skipToContent_fallback)
[![Lunatask](https://lunatask.app/img/logo.png)![Lunatask](https://lunatask.app/img/logo.png)**Lunatask**](https://lunatask.app/)
On this page
# Mood tracker
**‚ö°Ô∏è Energy level and stress trackers are available on Premium plan**
Our mood tracker lets you track your well-being over time and see how your new habits affect you. Besides tracking your mood, you can also track your emotions, feelings, energy and stress levels.
info
[Custom Trackers](https://ideas.lunatask.app/c/122-custom-trackers)will be coming to Lunatask in the future üåüIn Lunatask, there is always one value on each tracker for a given day ‚Äìyou cannot track your mood multiple times a day. Instead, we recommended to reflect on your day as a whole in the evening.
tip
You can set up a[daily habit](https://lunatask.app/docs/features/habits)for tracking our mood, your day, how you felt, and[schedule it](https://lunatask.app/docs/features/habits#scheduling)onto the calendar to get a reminder notification.
![Mood tracker](https://lunatask.app/assets/im
